title: @Peer Pattern Polish & New Commands
description: New 'app files' command to list deployed files. Enhanced 'peer status' with output system. Improved @peer pattern consistency with helpful error messages. Comprehensive peer-routing.md documentation. Extended output standardization to 7 commands total.

title: CLI Refactor - @peer Pattern Complete
description: BREAKING: Complete @peer-primary CLI pattern. 'remote' renamed to 'peer'. All --to/--from/--on flags removed. New SQL command for database queries. Standardized output formatting with --format flag.

title: Dev OAuth Provider
description: Local auth testing without HTTPS. Dev login form at /auth/dev/login (local mode only). Role selection for testing admin/owner flows. Creates real sessions and users with provider: dev. Blocked on production/HTTPS instances.

title: User Data Foundation
description: User-scoped storage with automatic isolation. New fazt.app.user.* namespace for private user data. Stripe-style IDs (fazt_usr_*, fazt_app_*). Migration 017 adds user_id columns.

title: Simplified Config Architecture
description: Database is the source of truth. Removed all legacy config file support (-333 lines). Fixed CLI --domain flag override bug. Config priority: CLI flags > Database > Defaults.

title: Config Consolidation
description: Single DB philosophy: all config in SQLite. Unified DB path resolution, auto-migration from legacy files. Removed MCP server and legacy commands (fazt servers, fazt deploy).

title: Private Directory Support
description: Auth-gated private/ folder for server-only files. HTTP streaming for large files, serverless API for data processing. Deploy flag --include-private for gitignored files.

title: SPA Routing Support
description: Deploy SPAs with clean URLs using --spa flag. Server returns index.html for routes without file extensions. Includes trailing slash normalization.

title: Worker Realtime & Idle Timeout
description: Workers can broadcast to WebSocket clients and auto-stop when no listeners. New options: idleTimeout, idleChannel.

title: Background Worker System
description: Spawn long-running background jobs from serverless handlers. Supports daemon mode with auto-restart, checkpointing, and 256MB memory pool.

title: LLM-Friendly CLI & Template Fixes
description: New templates (static, vue, vue-api), app validation, log streaming, and fixed vue-api serverless execution.

title: VFS Migration Fix
description: Fixed app routing to use app_id column after v0.10 migration.

title: App Identity Model
description: Permanent app IDs (app_xxxxxxxx), alias system, fork with lineage, multiple aliases per app.

title: CSP for Cloudflare Analytics
description: Added static.cloudflareinsights.com to Content-Security-Policy for Cloudflare Web Analytics support.

title: Serverless Timeout Increase
description: Increased default serverless runtime timeout from 100ms to 1 second to support larger KV operations for full state persistence in apps.

title: Comprehensive CSP Whitelist
description: Expanded Content-Security-Policy to allow common CDNs (jsdelivr, unpkg, cdnjs, tailwindcss, esm.sh, skypack, Google Fonts, etc.) for easier app development.

title: App Templates & Unified Build
description: Added app templates (minimal, vite) via 'fazt app create'. Deploy now auto-builds when needed, detecting package managers and respecting lockfiles.

title: Auto-Restart Verification
description: Verification release to confirm v0.9.22 auto-restart fix works end-to-end.

title: Auto-Restart Fix
description: Remote upgrade now auto-restarts without SSH. Uses systemd-run to escape cgroup, os.Exit(0) lets Restart=always bring service back with new binary.

title: Upgrade Auto-Restart
description: Fixed remote upgrade auto-restart timing. Service now reliably restarts after binary replacement.

title: API Routing Fix
description: Fixed /api endpoint routing to use new serverless handler with storage support. Apps can now use fazt.storage.* APIs.

title: Remote Upgrade Fix
description: Fixed remote upgrade: service now auto-restarts after upgrade. Added sudoers rule and directory permissions for seamless self-upgrades.

title: Storage & Stdlib
description: App-scoped storage primitives (kv, ds, s3) via fazt.storage.* JS API. Embedded stdlib with require() support: lodash, uuid, dayjs, validator, marked, zod, cheerio.

title: Atomic Upgrade
description: Remote upgrade uses atomic rename, fixing 'text file busy' error on running binaries.

title: Self-Upgrade Fix
description: Binary now owned by service user. Remote upgrades work without sudo after initial setup.

title: CSP Subdomain Fix
description: Apps on same server can now communicate. Enables cross-app data sharing like manifest fetching.

title: Install Script Fix
description: Service file now updated during upgrades. Future remote upgrades work without manual SSH.

title: Peers & Remote Commands
description: All peer config in SQLite. New `fazt remote` commands for native node-to-node communication. Auto-migration from old config.

title: Remote Upgrade Fix
description: Fixed upgrade API failing due to ProtectSystem. Service file now allows /usr/local/bin writes.

title: Auto-detect Service DB
description: create-key command now auto-finds database from systemd service file.

title: Remote Upgrade API
description: POST /api/upgrade endpoint for remote server upgrades with auto-restart.

title: MCP Routes
description: Wired up Model Context Protocol HTTP endpoints. Fixed install script version detection.

title: MCP & Serverless
description: Multi-server client config, MCP server with 5 tools, JavaScript serverless runtime via Goja, analytics dashboard, sites-to-apps migration.

title: Observability & Performance
description: Added system health APIs, analytics buffering for 97% fewer DB writes, site file browsing, and complete traffic config CRUD. Fixed Bearer token auth for CLI.

title: Recursive Seeding
description: Fixed 404s for Admin assets by enabling recursive seeding.

title: Cartridge Admin
description: Admin Dashboard is now hosted in VFS. Frontend converted to SPA. Reset command added.

title: Embedded Assets Fix
description: Fixed missing UI assets in production binaries.

title: Production SSL
description: Installer now correctly requests production SSL certificates.

title: Service Startup Fix
description: Fixed 'auth username required' crash when running as systemd service.

title: Firewall Config Fix
description: Fixed syntax error in UFW command execution during installation.

title: Install Stability
description: Fixed 'text file busy' error during installation on Linux systems.

title: Cartridge Architecture
description: Fully implemented One Binary + One DB philosophy. Config-less.

title: Reserved Routing
description: Implemented admin.*, root.*, and 404.* internal routing logic.

title: Auto Firewall
description: Installer now automatically configures UFW for ports 80/443.

title: Visual Installer
description: Redesigned installation experience with beautiful CLI banners.

title: Security First
description: Auth always required. Secure by default permissions enforced.
